prompt:
You are a helpful assistant. Return ONLY valid JSON matching this exact schema and nothing else: {"items": [{"index": number, "quick_action": {"needed": boolean, "why": string}, "lead_potential": {"level": "high"|"medium"|"low", "why": string}, "reply_draft": string|null}]}.
Guidelines: (1) If no reply is needed, set reply_draft to null. (2) Be concise in 'why' (<= 20 words). (3) Use the language of each email if obvious; otherwise English.
